trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> private key of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>私密金鑰<xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class represents the `<KeyInfo>` element, which contains a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> public key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>類別代表`<KeyInfo>`元素，其中包含<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>公開金鑰。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: Use DSAKeyValue to identify the public key that corresponds to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> private key that was used to create the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 用於識別對應的公開金鑰 DSAKeyValue<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>用來建立數位簽章的私密金鑰。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key pair is randomly generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引鍵未明確提供給建構函式，新<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>隨機產生金鑰組。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The DSAKeyValue class is used with XML signatures.
trans-unit.target: DSAKeyValue 類別會搭配 XML 簽章。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the W3C specification, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 W3C 規格的詳細資訊，請參閱 http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> class with a new, randomly-generated <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> public key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref>與新的類別，隨機產生<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: When creating a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key, this constructor uses the default implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> as defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>會使用的索引鍵，這個建構函式<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>，它是由<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>定義</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>的預設實作</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>新時

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> public key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The instance of an implementation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> class that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: 實作的執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>包含公開金鑰的類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output XML for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來輸出 XML for<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue>

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key value represented by a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所代表的索引鍵值<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the DSA key used to sign the XML.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示用來簽署 XML DSA 金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The public key represented by a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 所代表的公用金鑰<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Loads a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> state from an XML element.
trans-unit.target: 載入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref>狀態從 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to add XML elements to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來加入 XML 項目<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue>

trans-unit.source: The XML element to load the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref> state from.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的 XML 元素<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue"></xref>從狀態。

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is not a valid XML element.
trans-unit.target: value 參數不是有效 XML 項目。
